files.patch:
@@ -58,0 +58,23 @@ + /** + * The directory name pattern for the user directories. + */ + public static final String userDirNamePattern = "hsperfdata_\\S*"; + + /** + * The file name pattern for PerfData shared memory files. + *

+ * This pattern must be kept in synch with the file name pattern + * used by the 1.4.2 and later HotSpot JVM. + */ + public static final String fileNamePattern = "^[0-9]+$"; + + /** + * The file name pattern for 1.4.1 PerfData shared memory files. + *

+ * This pattern must be kept in synch with the file name pattern + * used by the 1.4.1 HotSpot JVM. + */ + public static final String tmpFileNamePattern = + "^hsperfdata_[0-9]+(_[1-2]+)?$"; + +
